mainText:
I was a fan of Apple before it was cool. From my first MacII CX I was  
hooked on Apple. As a graphic designer and owner of a small commercial  
printing company I have experienced the magic first hand. From the  
earliest days of running primitive Pagemaker I would have nothing but  
Macs. I am so glad Steve was around to grow the company to the  
powerhouse it is today.

My condolences to his family and friends. He will be missed.
author: Rodney
